name: golang
long_description:
golang Cookbook ==================== Requirements ============ Platform -------- Tested on: * Debian GNU/Linux 6.0 **Notes**: This cookbook has been tested on the listed platforms. It may work on other platforms with or without modification. Attributes ---------- #### golang::default
Key Type Description Default
['go']['version'] String Go version 1.0.3
['go']['platform'] String `amd64` or `i386` amd64
Usage ----- #### golang::default Just include `golang` in your node's `run_list`: ```json { "name":"my_node", "run_list": [ "recipe[golang]" ] } ``` Contributing ------------ 1. Fork the repository on Github 2. Create a named feature branch (like `add_component_x`) 3. Write you change 6. Submit a Pull Request using Github Contributors ------------------- * **[@xaprb](https://github.com/xaprb)** * **[@crowdmatt](https://github.com/crowdmatt)**
